knimeNode.name: Generic Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: Generic loop start node with no termination criterion.

fullDescription.intro:
In combination with a "Variable Condition Loop (End)" node, you can build a loop while body is executed until a certain condition on one of the flow variables is met. The condition must be set in the loop's end node.
The input ports are just passed through to the output ports. You can add an arbitrary number of port pairs by using the “…” menu.
fullDescription.link: KNIME Flow Control Guide: Section Loops

ports.dynInPort: The input data, which can be a data table or any other arbitrary port object.
